message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,900,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,700,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but the price you're suggesting doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000.  I believe this is a competitive price and a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1,650,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
